metadata.title: CVE-2022-33127 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: The function that calls the diff tool in Diffy 3.4.1 does not properly handle double quotes in a filename when run in a windows environment. This allows attackers to execute arbitrary commands via a crafted string.

criterions.comment: ruby-diffy package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
